item.title: Notes about Puppet
item.description: Random notes about puppet configuration management tool and related topics. Puppet doesn’t like symlinks When you start building /etc/puppet/environments/production in your puppet master, don’t use symlinks on directory tree. I once made the mistake of using symlinks for manifests and modules directories and was getting frustrated, when puppet agent didn’t seem to get my manifests/site.pp file. Once I copied all the directly into /etc/puppet/environments/production tree, things started to work. Use info(), notice() or debug() in site.
